level.heading: Application of subchapter--Entry of guilty plea.
level.text: This subchapter shall not apply to any person whose conviction resulted from his entering a plea of guilty unless that plea was pursuant to North Carolina v. Alford, 400 U.S. 25 (1970).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-143, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-421.
